trans-unit.source: Enables you to sort pages alphabetically by title, sub-title or by creation time etc. You can also reverse the order of pages in the page tree.

Pages in the page tree are always ordered manually. It is possible to move pages up and down etc. But this wizard gives you a quick way to change the manual order of sub-pages. Simply click one of the links in the bottom of the wizard screen: Page title Will sort pages by their page title. Subtitle Will sort page by their Subtitle field. Change-time Will sort pages by the date they were last changed. Create-time Will sort pages by their creation date. Reverse current order Click this to reverse the current order. For example, if you want to sort pages alphabetically but in descending order you simply sort by title first and then reverse the order by clicking this.

trans-unit.source: Enables you to create a batch of new, empty pages for quickly building up a new page tree. Just enter the titles for the pages you need. Only filled in fields will be created as pages.

The new pages will always be created as subpages to the currently active page from the page tree. This page is shown in the top of the page. In the example image below it is "/Intro/Startpage/". "Place new pages after the existing subpages" If you select this option the pages will be create after any existing subpages. "Hide new pages" Select this if the new pages should be hidden by default. This option may be forced upon you if you do not have credentials to create new, online pages. Lorem Ipsum... The Create new page wizard supports the Lorem Ipsum extension providing dummy content for the fields.
